scripts.sync:web: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force www, www/icons | Out-Null; Copy-Item index.html,style.css,script.js,manifest.json,sw.js -Destination www -Force; Copy-Item icons/* -Destination www/icons -Force"
scripts.sync:android: npm run sync:web && npx cap sync android
scripts.sync:ios: npm run sync:web && npx cap sync ios
scripts.build:android:debug: npm run sync:android && cd android && gradlew.bat assembleDebug
scripts.build:android:release:apk: npm run sync:android && cd android && gradlew.bat assembleRelease
scripts.build:android:release:aab: npm run sync:android && cd android && gradlew.bat bundleRelease
